title: Industry-linked Project-based Learning to Enhance Career Awareness for IT Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher expertise in IT and practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in corporate training settings with provided digital devices (laptops, online collaboration tools), designed around industry-linked projects applicable to real-world tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the latest trends and job requirements in the IT industry to concretize their career pathways.
Learners can validate their work competencies and build a portfolio by completing projects that solve real-world industry problems.
Learners can strengthen networking capabilities and develop concrete employment strategies through collaboration with industry experts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
